UpgradedDefect:ShockingTouch.NAME: Shocking Touch
UpgradedDefect:ShockingTouch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Trigger the passive ability of all Lightning orbs.

UpgradedDefect:Shelter.NAME: Shelter
UpgradedDefect:Shelter.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Orb slot. NL Channel !M! Frost. NL Exhaust.

UpgradedDefect:Accelerate.NAME: Accelerate
UpgradedDefect:Accelerate.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Lose 1 Focus. NL Exhaust.

UpgradedDefect:Flux.NAME: Flux
UpgradedDefect:Flux.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL Gain !M! Block for every Lightning orb you have.

UpgradedDefect:IcePalm.NAME: Ice Palm
UpgradedDefect:IcePalm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, Channel !M! Frost.

UpgradedDefect:Infuse.NAME: Infuse
UpgradedDefect:Infuse.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strenght. NL Lose 1 Focus. NL Lose 1 Orb slot. NL Exhaust.

UpgradedDefect:RoboticWalls.NAME: Robotic Walls
UpgradedDefect:RoboticWalls.DESCRIPTION: Every time you channel 1 Frost, gain !M! Plated Armor.

UpgradedDefect:Hack.NAME: Hack
UpgradedDefect:Hack.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL You draw 1 less card next turn.

UpgradedDefect:FrostBarrage.NAME: Frost Barrage
UpgradedDefect:FrostBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Channeled Frost.

UpgradedDefect:ClawSnap.NAME: Claw Snap
UpgradedDefect:ClawSnap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Channel !M! Frost. NL Claw.

UpgradedDefect:Clawbound.NAME: Clawbound
UpgradedDefect:Clawbound.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put the next card you play this turn on top of your draw pile. NL Claw.
UpgradedDefect:Clawbound.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put the next card you play this turn on top of your draw pile. NL Claw twice.

UpgradedDefect:CustomStack.NAME: Stack
UpgradedDefect:CustomStack.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Increase this block by !M! this combat. NL Claw.
